pickaxe.description: A stereotypical pickaxe made of steel. Useful for mining bitcoin but worse, but unfortunately because no one holds it correctly, it often breaks.

[object Object].description: dummy item to prevent killing moofy :(

wooden potato.description: An inedible potato made of wood. This potato was discovered on a farm in Idaho and is rumoured to have mysterious electrical properties. The farmers originally used the potato as an insulator in electrical circuits, but now it is used as a modern device for getting a child (or adult) sick through unsupervised consumption.

moofy coffee.description: Coffee is an incredible food item commonly used to be less tired. Moofy coffee is unique in that it is strawberry-flavoured and is magnetic. Consuming the coffee can reduce the time it takes for you to get less tired by 3-11 minutes.
